versus.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to show that two people or teams are competing against each other in a game or court case
versus.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the New York Knicks versus the LA Lakers
the Supreme Court decision in Roe vs. Wade
versus.translation[0].definitions[1].def: used when comparing the advantages of two different things, ideas etc
versus.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The finance minister must weigh up the benefits of a tax cut versus those of increased public spending.
versus.translation[1].definitions[0].def: used to show that two people or companies are against each other in a legal case
versus.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The judge agreed with the decision in White versus Illinois.
